extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereqistration    Limited to registration in a MUSC Plan or the BMUS Program

basic.description:
Group instruction in the basic techniques and methods of a selected non-Western instrument and their application to teaching. Rental instruments available. 
NOTE    Enrolment is limited to students in a MUSC Plan or the B.Mus. Program.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Techniques and Methods of Non-Western Instruments
